data.actual_result: You can send the message and Clyde replies with a “not delivered”
data.expected_result: The send button shouldn’t even be clickable
data.short_description: When going into DMs, press space and send a message. Clyde will reply the message couldn’t be delivered.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a DM message - Just type a space - Send the message - Results
